scripts.test:browser:install: cd packages/browser-test-runner && pnpm exec playwright install
scripts.test:browser:regression: cd packages/browser-test-runner && pnpm exec playwright test regression
scripts.test:browser:report: cd packages/browser-test-runner && pnpm exec playwright show-report
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run build:deps && cd packages/client && pnpm run build:prod
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm run build
